content.html: Every year there are a SLEW of accusations of racism, sexism, transphobia against a tech company or event. Every year. Despite the groups & initiatives & newsletters & "DEI" education & anti-racist reading lists... Every year it's the same shit.
content.value:
Every year there are a SLEW of accusations of racism, sexism, transphobia against a tech company or event. Every year. Despite the groups & initiatives & newsletters & "DEI" education & anti-racist reading lists...

Every year it's the same shit.
